items.sentence: You should study hard so that you can pass the examination.
I don\'t have enough time to explain that to you in detail.
I don\'t know how long it takes to get to Boston from here.
I don\'t know if her new shirt will go with her blue jeans.
Tom spent the whole night worrying about what might happen.
Tom started learning French when he was thirteen years old.
Tom stayed in Boston and continued living with his parents.
Tom knew that Mary was very unlikely to be able to do that.
Tom likes soft-boiled eggs and Mary likes hard-boiled eggs.
Are you sure you don\'t want me to help you do the laundry?
As far as we can tell, Tom wasn\'t involved in the robbery.
A lot of people are waiting to see what is going to happen.
According to the paper, there was an earthquake last night.
As soon as it stopped raining a beautiful rainbow appeared.
Because I had a bad cold, I went to bed earlier than usual.
Because of the storm, we had no choice but to stay at home.
Can you imagine what life would be like without television?
The school Tom goes to is looking for a new French teacher.
Tom and I bought our plane tickets three months in advance.
Tom and Mary have gone swimming together a number of times.
